# HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.measurement(_:)

**Case**

A single voltage measurement.

## Declaration

```swift
case measurement(HKElectrocardiogram.VoltageMeasurement)
```

## Results

- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.done**: The query has finished returning voltage measurements.
- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.error(_:)**: An error occurred while accessing the voltage measurements.

items.description: The query has finished returning voltage measurements.
items.name: HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.done

items.description: An error occurred while accessing the voltage measurements.
